mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USERS ( EMAIL, USER_NICKNAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_COMENT ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_password}, #{user_coment} )
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, USER_NICKNAME, DATE_FORMAT(USER_INDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS USER_INDATE FROM TBL_USERS ORDER BY USER_INDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USERS SET USER_NICKNAME = #{user_nickname}, USER_PASSWORD = #{user_password}, USER_COMENT = #{user_coment}, USER_EDITDATE = NOW() WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
UPDATE TBL_USERS SET USER_STATEMENT = 2, USER_DEDATE = NOW() WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
